Hello, John.
Hello, David.

This week on the Gap Fest, the response to the evolved shootings, the catastrophic
police mistakes that were made, the lies that have been told, and the prospects for gun

On Wednesday, Texas officials acknowledged that a teacher did not, in fact, leave a door

What is sticking with you?
I have just been driven by this story and I know there are so many terrible things that

And one reason for it, I think, is that I feel such frustration that this 18 year old was
so easily able to obtain a gun and that we've had this string of legally authorized gun

And here are the last line of defense failed, right?
The idea that the police that law enforcement in the state of Texas, which is, you know,

It's unfathomable.
You're right.

We haven't listened to the voices of those children on those calls.
I mean, that is going to be truly unbearable.
But we know that there were shots being fired as the police were standing in the hallway

And I just can't understand it.
And I can't understand how we've gotten to this past where these were the rescuers.
They were supposed to rush in.
They failed and the country still seems frozen.
There's been this interesting question about should we see the photographs of the scene

And which is a different question from should we hear the calls?

I think there's something about the human voice.

And the idea behind pictures or voice is to keep this real and not allow the fact that

There have been several shootings even since this one, you know, to keep people from being

Lock doors aren't going to stop them because they go there.
It just seems like everything I read about this botched response affirms the idea that

That's all totally true and well said.

President Biden plans to cancel $10,000 of federal student debt for anyone who has federal
student loans and earns less than $150,000 a year.

so easy, so simply.

Right.

would be calibrated to those who make less than $150,000 and $300,000 for a married couple.
